overview: Neighbors and college friends Marisa (Kirsten Price) and Jake (Rocco Reed) are complete opposites. His bedroom has a revolving door of lovers and Marisa prefers the quiet life with her boring, but predictable man. But Marisa and Jake find themselves at odds when he hires her to be his stand in girlfriend for his father's birthday party. But can opposites attract? Sometimes what you've been looking for has been right in front of you...
title: Girlfriend for Hire
